title: Manage landing page
description: The challenge is to build out a landing page with newsletter sign up form.It was a great test for responsive skills because there are lots of small details and slight content shifts for different screen sizes.

title: FAQ accordion
description: The challenge is to build a FAQ accordion.where users can Hide/Show the answer with a click or keyboard navigation

title: REST Countries API with color theme switcher
description: The challenge is integrating with the REST Countries API to pull country data and display it like in the designs, search country by name  or filter by region.

title: Multi-step form
description: The challenge is to build out a multi-step form, to complete each step sequentially, go back to update selection and receive validation.

title: E-commerce product page
description: The challenge is to build a beautiful product page. That test JS skills with a lightbox product gallery and cart functionality!

title: Results summary component
description: The challenge is building a results summary component and fetch and display result from JSON

title: Newsletter sign-up form with success message
description: The challenge is to build newsletter form with basic form structure, validation, and submission.

title: URL shortening API landing page
description: The challenge is to build a landing page and integrate with URL shortening API to create shortened URLs and display them.

title: Space tourism multi-page website
description: The challenge is to build a multi-page space tourism website, with each page having tabs and carousels to show different information.
